PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-11072015-07-16,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PMO,  FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectFinance Canada ** Crown Corporation Expenditures **
PrecisOrder directing the CANADA DEPOSIT INSURANCE CORPORATION, THE CANADA DEVELOPMENT INVESTMENT CORPORATION, PPP CANADA INC. AND THE ROYAL CANADIAN MINT in order to (1) align their travel, hospitality, conference and event expenditures policies, guidelines and practices with Treasury Board policies, directives and related instruments on travel, hospitality, conference and event expenditures in a manner that is consistent with their legal obligations; and (2) report on the implementation of this directive in their next corporate plan.
AttachmentsAttachment
